name: Multiple expressions
title: Multiple expressions

testSteps.description:
When Sandra requests evaluation of:
| expression |
| 2 + 3      |
| 2 - 3      |
| 2 * 2 + 2  |
| 2 + 2 * 2  |

children.description: Sandra requests evaluation of multiple expressions
Sandra sends a POST request to '/v4'

children.description: Sandra ensures that the status of the last response does equal 200

testSteps.description:
Then she should get following results:
| expected_result |
| 5               |
| -1              |
| 6               |
| 6               |

children.description: Sandra ensures that the body of the last response does have property result that does equal [ "5", "-1", "6", "6" ]

userStory.narrative:
[math.js](https://mathjs.org/) is available as a RESTful API at [api.mathjs.org](https://api.mathjs.org/).

Evaluations can be done via GET or POST requests.
The duration per evaluation of this free service is limited to 10 seconds,
with a maximum of 10,000 requests per day.

description: Requests to evaluate multiple expression should be sent to the [POST endpoint](https://api.mathjs.org/#post).

actors.name: Sandra
can: ScheduleWork { scheduler: { clock: { timeAdjustment: { milliseconds: 0 } }, interactionTimeout: { milliseconds: 5000 } } }
CallAnApi { baseURL: "http://api.mathjs.org/v4/", headers: { common: { Accept: "application/json, text/plain, */*" } }, timeout: 10000 }
